feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E102G07 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 29, 07:00 - 08:30 UTC

Sep 17, 22:18 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on rack E102G07.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 29/10/2025 07:00 UTC
End time: 29/10/2025 08:30 UTC
Service impact: During the operation, servers in rack E102G07 will be temporarily unavailable.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will migrate servers in rack E102G07 to rack ERI0102B03C.

Thank you for your understanding.
